    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CaptureTrigger​(java.lang.String[] attackerList, java.lang.String[] victimList)
      CaptureListener will put an event on the event stack if certain Pieces capture certain other Pieces.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CaptureTrigger

        public CaptureTrigger​(java.lang.String[] attackerList,
                      java.lang.String[] victimList)
        CaptureListener will put an event on the event stack if certain Pieces capture certain other Pieces.
        Parameters:
        attackerList - A list of all attackers that this trigger MUST have. Passing null means any piece type may trigger.
        victimList - A list of all victims that this trigger MUST have. Passing null means any piece type may trigger.
